DOC.brief_summary: This study design evaluate effect VX-509 pharmacokinetics ( PK ) corticosteroid ( prednisone methylprednisolone ) effect corticosteroid PK VX-509 metabolite . The study also evaluate safety tolerability VX-509 coadministered corticosteroid .
DOC.brief_title: Phase 1 PK Interaction Study Between VX-509 Prednisone Methylprednisolone Healthy Male Subjects
DOC.criteria: Male subject 18 55 year age , inclusive Body mass index ( BMI ) 18.0 31.0 kg/m2 , inclusive , total body weight > 50 kg History illness , opinion investigator subject 's general practitioner , might confound result study pose additional risk administer study drug ( ) subject .
